overview: Hamed, the 13-year-old teenager has to both study and help his mother with work after his father’s death. He carries the clothes his mother makes to her customers riding an old bicycle left for him from his father. He has to ride long distances every day. Meanwhile the ministry of education makes an announcement about a bicycle race for guidance school students. For the same reason, Hamed takes every risk to get a bicycle for the race. However, he takes part with the same old bicycle.
title: قصه من و دوچرخه بابام
